message:
The supreme leader of Iran at a ceremony to mark the 35th anniversary of the death of his predecessor in office - Ruhollah Khomeini:

The "Tufan Al-Aqsa" war came at the right moment. The area needed the October 7th attack.
It was a necessity against the Western American project to change the regional equations.
The war, which came at a sensitive time, thwarted attempts at normalization with the Zionist entity and its takeover of the region.
The Palestinian issue has now become the number one issue in the entire world.

Mexico: Claudia Sheinbaum stands to be the first woman to be elected president of Mexico.

Sheinbaum, who won the elections in Mexico this morning with about 60% of the votes, is Jewish, born to parents from Lithuania and Bulgaria, a scientist, a climate expert and a member of the left political current in Mexico. She has good relations with the US and makes sure to keep the media quiet about her being Jewish.
She has spoken out against Israel in the war with Hamas.

A quote caught this morning by Arab media, from Yossi Cohen, the former head of the Mossad:
We know where Nasrallah is and if we want we can eliminate him at any moment.

##
Why procrastinate? Asking for a friend...
The moment the Israeli was located this morning in East Nablus by the PA's security mechanisms.

IDF Spokesperson: A short while ago, the IDF 'Arrow' Aerial Defense System successfully intercepted a surface-to-surface missile that was fired from the direction of the Red Sea toward Israel. Rocket and missile sirens were sounded in the area of Eilat. No injuries were reported.

Trump, to a question from journalists:
I will declassify the 9/11 files, the Kennedy assassination files and the Epstein files...
The IDF's operation in the Zeytoun neighborhood in Gaza City in May: before and after

IDF Spokesperson: The IDF located the body of Dolev Yehud

Following a scientific identification and a thorough analysis by the IDF in coordination with anthropological experts, the body of Dolev Yehud was found in Kibbutz Nir Oz.  

Dolev Yehud (35), from Kibbutz Nir Oz, was a paramedic with United Hatzalah and MDA. During the brutal October 7th terror attacks, Dolev left his house in an attempt to save lives. 
Dolev was murdered by the Hamas terror organization on the 7th of October, and his body was located in Kibbutz Nir Oz. 

The IDF notified Dolev's family following an identification process that was carried out by medical officials from the National Institute of Forensic Medicine and Shura military base.
The IDF expresses its deep condolences to the family at this difficult time.

Attached is a photo of Dolev Yehud: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC03062024019214

The Palestinians report 25 deaths tonight in the Gaza Strip in four IDF strikes:

1. 4 killed in the attack on the house of the Abu Nar family in Nuseirat (central Gaza)👆.

2. 10 killed in the attack on the homes of the Abu Qater and Albar families east of the Islamic University in Khan Yunis (south of the Gaza Strip).

3. 6 killed in the attack on the home of the Akel family in block 9 of the Bureij refugee camp in the center of the Gaza Strip.

4. 5 killed in an attack on a group of people near the al-Ansar Mosque in the Zawayda area in the center of the Gaza Strip.

Civil Defense in Gaza: We rescued over 70 bodies from the Jabaliya refugee camp (after the IDF withdrew).
There are many more bodies under the ruins of the buildings.

Syria: unusual attack in northern Aleppo

The Syrian Ministry of Defense announced early in the morning that shortly after midnight, Israeli warplanes attacked Aleppo and as a result several people were killed.

Unofficial sources identified with the Shiite axis report that IDF warplanes flew (as seen in the attached map) over the Jordanian border, entered Syria through the American no-fly zone in Tanaf (in the Jordan-Syria-Iraq border triangle area) and from there continued north towards Aleppo.
According to the report, the copper factory was attacked in the Alhian area in northern Aleppo.
These sources report 17 dead and 15 wounded among the soldiers of the Syrian army and the Shiite militias - certainly a high and unusual number. The location of the attack target and the flight path to it are also unusual.

Nablus: This morning the security forces of the Palestinian Authority located a young Israeli who was walking around in the east of Nablus (in the area of ​​al-Maslah Square) after searching for him since early in the morning.
According to Palestinian sources, a group of Israelis (according to the video - ultra-Orthodox) walked around East Nablus unaccompanied, after Jews entered Joseph's Tomb in Nablus last night.
According to these sources, this is the first time in many years that Israelis have walked around unaccompanied in East Nablus.
